Description: Provides a lump sum payment in the event of death or diagnosis of a terminal illness where death is likely within 24 months.

Eligibility: Must be combined with life cover
Description: Optional add-on that provides a lump sum payment if diagnosed with one of 14 defined critical illnesses, including certain types of vascular disease, cardiac surgery, specified cancers, degenerative diseases, and major organ failure.

Eligibility: Must be combined with life cover

Eligibility: Must be working at least 20 hours and also combied with life cover
Description: Optional add-on that provides a lump sum payment if unable to ever work again due to sickness, injury, or major physical impairment.
